testcase.name: Search Customer By Name
testcase.system-out: Given user opens url "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login".............passed When user enters email as "admin@yourstore.com" and password as "admin".....passed And click on login..........................................................passed Then user can view dashboard................................................passed When user click on customers menu...........................................passed And click on customers menu item............................................passed And enter customer firstname................................................passed And enter customer lastname.................................................passed When click on search button.................................................passed Then user should found name in the search table.............................passed And close browser...........................................................passed
